name: Babel (bzlaabnieni)
description:
A long time ago, the people of the world lived in harmony. Their different languages were translated by the great Tower in the centre. But, one day, the tower was sabotaged, and collapsed. Understanding broke down, and conflict grew. Now, Ash, a wood nymph, has been chosen to reunite the world, and bring harmony once more.

Written in a team of three for Trijam #31: Towers. We completed the game in 4 hours, 4 minutes and 59 seconds.

Music is Royalty Free music by Kevin MacLeod:

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Magic Forest" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
